opengrok.auth.plugin

Class LdapFilterPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • opengrok.auth.plugin.AbstractLdapPlugin
      • opengrok.auth.plugin.LdapFilterPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuthorizationPlugin

    public class LdapFilterPlugin
extends AbstractLdapPlugin
    Authorization plug-in to check if given user matches configured LDAP filter.
    Author:
    Krystof Tulinger

      • expandFilter

        protected String expandFilter(String filter,
                              LdapUser ldapUser,
                              User user)
        Expand LdapUser attribute values into the filter. Special values are:
        • %username% - to be replaced with username value from the User object
        • %guid% - to be replaced with guid value from the User object
        Use \% for printing the '%' character.
        Parameters:
        filter - basic filter containing the special values
        ldapUser - user from LDAP
        user - user from the request
        Returns:
        replaced result

      • updateSession

        protected void updateSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                             boolean allowed)
        Add a new allowed value into the session.
        Parameters:
        req - the request
        allowed - the new value
